title: Ed TV
description: 31-year-old video store clerk, Ed Pekurny, has cameras following his every move 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
quote: Somebody smart said, ‘Practicality wins out.‘ So, in this bathroom, I’m a winner.
altHero: Ed, shirtless and flexing while brushing his teeth
alt2: Ed and his mom, who looks angry, looking at the camera
alt3: Ed’s brother Ray and a woman friend
